meanings.definition: A person who pays homage or makes a pledge of loyalty.
meanings.sent1: The homagers gathered to honor their king with gifts.
meanings.sent2: The homagers bowed before the queen in a show of loyalty.
meanings.sent3: The homagers decided to throw a surprise party for their leader.
meanings.sent4: The homagers were like loyal knights, always ready to defend their ruler.
meanings.sent5: The homagers' unwavering loyalty was evident in their every action.

meanings.definition: To pay homage or show respect to someone.
meanings.sent1: They homagers paid their respects by laying flowers at the memorial.
meanings.sent2: She homagers her ancestors by visiting their graves every year.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to homagers their teacher by cleaning the classroom.
meanings.sent4: The crowd homagers the hero with a standing ovation.
meanings.sent5: He homagers his mentor by following in his footsteps with dedication.
